input.sentences: here is a man with a powerful sign .
the protestors are not letting this person get through .
here the protestors are blocking the road .
the police have to come and make sure the protestors stop standing on the streets .
output.sentences: The sign one man held was very powerful.
Some protesters were not letting a person get through.
Other protestors were blocking the road.
Still more stopped in the streets, standing in the road.
